response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the ice cube into the glass. Now, the next step is to put the straw into the glass.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take out an ice cube from the fridge
(3) Put the ice cube into the glass
(4) Put the straw into the glass
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Put the straw into the glass
    water_glass = registry(env, "water_glass_85")
    straw = registry(env, "straw_92")
    put_ontop(robot, straw, water_glass)
    donothing(env)
